00050 void SCA_ActuatorEventManager::NextFrame()
00051 {
00052     // check for changed actuator
00053     SG_DList::iterator<SCA_ISensor> it(m_sensors);
00054     for (it.begin();!it.end();++it)
00055     {
00056         (*it)->Activate(m_logicmgr);
00057     }
00058 }
00059 
00060 void SCA_ActuatorEventManager::UpdateFrame()
00061 {
00062     // update the state of actuator before executing them
00063     SG_DList::iterator<SCA_ActuatorSensor> it(m_sensors);
00064     for (it.begin();!it.end();++it)
00065     {
00066         (*it)->Update();
00067     }
00068 }
